text: Nabbi abakkiriza gwe basaanira okuwa e kitiibwa okusinga bo bennyini, era bakyalabe baba ba Maama baabwe, bo ab'oluganda abamu ku bo be basinga okusaanira bannaabwe (mu by'obusika) ekyo bwe kityo bwe kiri mu kitabo kya Katonda, okusinga bwe bandibadde eri abakkiriza n'abaasenguka, okugyako nga mukoledde ba nnammwe eky'obuntu bulamu, ebyo nno byawandiikibwa mu Kitabo
